Name: Hydro Hilichurl Rogue
Title: "Razorwave Roamer" Hydro Hilichurl Rogue
Desc: Hilichurl wanderers unaffiliated with any specific tribe. They can often be found roving the wilds as if in voluntary exile.
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Hydro Hilichurl Rogue

22052.Name: Slash of Surging Tides
22052.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].\nIf an opposing character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C106]</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122052]</color> attached, this character gains 1 $[K310]. (Once per Round)

C106.Name: Frozen
C106.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Character cannot use Skills.</color> (Lasts until the end of this Round)\nWhen this character receives $[K103] or $[K100], removes this effect and increases DMG taken by 2.

K103.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>
K103.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

C122052.Name: Mist Bubble Prison
C122052.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Character cannot use Skills.</color> (Lasts until the end of this Round)

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.

22053.Name: Bubblefloat Blitz
22053.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. Creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122051]</color> in your Hand.\n(Characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122051]</color> equipped can use the Technique: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S1220511]</color>)

C122051.Name: Mist Bubble Slime
C122051.Desc: $[K58]: $[S1220511]\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>\n(A character can only equip 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique at a time)

K58.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique</color>
K58.Desc: When the active character is equipped with a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique card, they can use the corresponding {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008} Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
